description: Conduct deep conversations to understand user needs experiences and pain points through active listening
facilitation_prompts: What brings you here today?|Walk me through a recent experience|What frustrates you most?|What would make this easier?|Tell me more about that

description: Create visual representation of what users say think do and feel to build deep understanding
facilitation_prompts: What did they say?|What might they be thinking?|What actions did they take?|What emotions surfaced?

description: Observe users in their natural environment to see unspoken behaviors and contextual factors
facilitation_prompts: Watch without interrupting|Note their workarounds|What patterns emerge?|What do they not say?

description: Document complete user experience across touchpoints to identify pain points and opportunities
facilitation_prompts: What's their starting point?|What steps do they take?|Where do they struggle?|What delights them?|What's the emotional arc?

description: Have users document experiences over time to capture authentic moments and evolving needs
facilitation_prompts: What did you experience today?|How did you feel?|What worked or didn't?|What surprised you?

description: Transform observations into clear actionable problem statements that inspire solution generation
facilitation_prompts: What's the real problem?|Who experiences this?|Why does it matter?|What would success look like?

description: Reframe problems as opportunity questions that open solution space without prescribing answers
facilitation_prompts: How might we help users...?|How might we make it easier to...?|How might we reduce the friction of...?

description: Create specific user-centered problem statements that capture who what and why
facilitation_prompts: User type needs what because insight|What's driving this need?|Why does it matter to them?

description: Group related observations and insights to reveal patterns and opportunity themes
facilitation_prompts: What connects these?|What themes emerge?|Group similar items|Name each cluster|What story do they tell?

description: Identify functional emotional and social jobs users are hiring solutions to accomplish
facilitation_prompts: What job are they trying to do?|What progress do they want?|What are they really hiring this for?|What alternatives exist?

description: Generate large quantity of diverse ideas without judgment to explore solution space fully
facilitation_prompts: No bad ideas|Build on others|Go for quantity|Be visual|Stay on topic|Defer judgment

description: Rapidly sketch eight solution variations in eight minutes to force quick creative thinking
facilitation_prompts: Fold paper in 8|1 minute per sketch|No overthinking|Quantity over quality|Push past obvious

description: Apply seven design lenses to existing solutions - Substitute Combine Adapt Modify Purposes Eliminate Reverse
facilitation_prompts: What could we substitute?|How could we combine elements?|What could we adapt?|How could we modify it?|Other purposes?|What to eliminate?|What if reversed?

description: Create deliberately provocative or extreme prototypes to spark breakthrough thinking
facilitation_prompts: What's the most extreme version?|Make it ridiculous|Push boundaries|What useful insights emerge?

description: Find inspiration from completely different domains to spark innovative connections
facilitation_prompts: What other field solves this?|How does nature handle this?|What's an analogous problem?|What can we borrow?

description: Create quick low-fidelity sketches and mockups to make ideas tangible for testing
facilitation_prompts: Sketch it out|Make it rough|Focus on core concept|Test assumptions|Learn fast

description: Act out user scenarios and service interactions to test experience flow and pain points
facilitation_prompts: Play the user|Act out the scenario|What feels awkward?|Where does it break?|What works?

description: Simulate complex functionality manually behind scenes to test concept before building
facilitation_prompts: Fake the backend|Focus on experience|What do they think is happening?|Does the concept work?

description: Visualize user experience across time and touchpoints as sequential illustrated narrative
facilitation_prompts: What's scene 1?|How does it progress?|What's the emotional journey?|Where's the climax?|How does it resolve?

description: Build tangible artifacts users can touch and interact with to test form and function
facilitation_prompts: Make it 3D|Use basic materials|Make it interactive|Test ergonomics|Gather reactions

description: Watch users attempt tasks with prototype to identify friction points and opportunities
facilitation_prompts: Try to accomplish X|Think aloud please|Don't help them|Where do they struggle?|What surprises them?

description: Organize user feedback across likes questions ideas and changes for actionable insights
facilitation_prompts: What did they like?|What questions arose?|What ideas did they have?|What needs changing?

description: Compare two variations to understand which approach better serves user needs
facilitation_prompts: Show version A|Show version B|Which works better?|Why the difference?|What does data show?

description: Identify and validate critical assumptions underlying your solution to reduce risk
facilitation_prompts: What are we assuming?|How can we test this?|What would prove us wrong?|What's the riskiest assumption?

description: Use test insights to improve prototype through rapid cycles of refinement and re-testing
facilitation_prompts: What did we learn?|What needs fixing?|What stays?|Make changes quickly|Test again

description: Launch small-scale real-world implementation to learn before full rollout
facilitation_prompts: Start small|Real users|Real context|What breaks?|What works?|Scale lessons learned

description: Map all service components interactions and touchpoints to guide implementation
facilitation_prompts: What's visible to users?|What happens backstage?|What systems are needed?|Where are handoffs?

description: Build consistent patterns components and guidelines for scalable implementation
facilitation_prompts: What patterns repeat?|Create reusable components|Document standards|Enable consistency

description: Bring team and stakeholders along journey to build shared understanding and commitment
facilitation_prompts: Show the research|Walk through prototypes|Share user stories|Build empathy|Get buy-in

description: Define success metrics and feedback loops to track impact and inform future iterations
facilitation_prompts: How will we measure success?|What are key metrics?|How do we gather feedback?|When do we revisit?
